PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2005-21382005-11-22,  HERITAGE,  ,  , 
ActMuseums Act
PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Minister of Canadian Heritage of PATRICIA BOVEY of Winnipeg, Manitoba, as a trustee of the Board of Trustees of the National Gallery of Canada to hold office during pleasure for a term of three years, in the place of Meeka Walsh.
AttachmentsAttachment
